official_title: Expressing support for emergency first responders and States and local communities, which are on the front lines of the Nation's homeland defense.

summary.text: Calls for full funding of first responder programs, including the additional resources that are required to assist States and local communities and first responders in making the Nation's homeland defense as strong as possible.

titles.title: Expressing support for emergency first responders and States and local communities, which are on the front lines of the Nation's homeland defense.
